thread.title: Marnie Simpson is STILL living with Lewis Bloor after he cheated: 'It's f***ed up and really complicated
thread.title_full: Marnie Simpson is STILL living with Lewis Bloor after he cheated: 'It's f***ed up and really complicated

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Marnie Simpson is STILL living with Lewis Bloor after he cheated: 'It's f***ed up and really complicated
text:
Share this video Watch Next 
Earlier this week, Marnie responded angrily to reports linking her to TOWIE hunk Dan Edgar and branded them "total bulls**t". 
The Geordie Shore beauty hit back in a foul-mouthed rant after it was claimed she had been seen getting "touchy feel" with her fellow reality star, and she's clearly not happy with the speculation. 
She didn't hold back, getting straight to the point as she took to Twitter and ranted: "Stop talking total bulls**t me and Dan are pals nothing more." Marnie Simpson has hit out at the reports (Photo: WENN.com) 
It came after the Daily Star had claimed they "kept disappearing off together" during a recent night out in London. 
However, she moved to dismiss this - just as she's opened up about the situation with Lewis Bloor . 
The former couple still haven't reconciled their romance quite yet - but Marnie did hint that things could be in a decent place. She said Dan is just a friend (Photo: Rex Features) She's living with Lewis Bloor - but they're not back together (Photo: WENN.com) 
"It's just weird that I'm in Essex and bumping into people he knows," she wrote in her Star column. 
"We're not back together but we share a flat and we are speaking." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
